recipe.title: Tzatziki
recipe.step: Cut cucumber in half lengthwise and scoop out pips, until only meaty part left.
Cut thinly and add to a bowl with the rest of the ingredients.
Serve with meals with breads or crackers as a dip- it is very versatile! (Tzatziki is really a taste preference and taste it once you have mix all the ingredients together.
You may want to add more garlic, lemon juice or cumin ect!).
